item.title: 经济低迷，降息在即，奇异果涨势或将减弱
item.description: 由于新西兰央行继续降息，当地经济依然低迷，新西兰元的涨势可能会在下半年消退。【原文：The New Zealand dollar’s rally may fade in the second half of the year, as the central bank continues to cut interest rates and the local economy remains sluggish.】

item.title: 德国 400 亿美元养老金委托中国股票基金管理
item.description: 一家德国养老基金已聘请一家中国公司在香港的分支机构帮助其投资本地股票，这在对投资中国股票持谨慎态度的全球投资机构中实属罕见。【原文：A German pension fund has tapped a Chinese firm’s Hong Kong arm to help it invest in local stocks, in a rare move among global allocators that have been cautious about gaining exposure to the nation’s equities.】

item.title: 部长表示泰国预算法案和支出将按计划进行
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，泰国将继续推进刺激经济的计划，并按计划通过明年的预算，从而缓解人们对当前政治危机可能破坏经济政策的担忧。【原文：Thailand will push ahead with plans to stimulate the economy and pass the budget for next year as planned, Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira said, easing concerns that an ongoing political crisis could derail economic policy.】

item.title: 对简街印度业务的限制可能加深期权市场的低迷
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对 "反美 "金砖国家结盟征收 10%关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将对任何与 "金砖国家的反美政策 "保持一致的国家额外征收 10%的关税，这给全球贸易注入了更多不确定性，因为美国仍在与许多贸易伙伴谈判征税事宜。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would put an additional 10% tariff on any country aligning themselves with “the Anti-American policies of BRICS,” injecting further uncertainty into global trade as the US continues to negotiate levies with many trading partners.】

item.title: 李泽楷的 FWD 集团首次公开募股（IPO）耗资 4.42 亿美元，在香港上市后股价下跌
item.description: 亿万富豪李泽楷的复地集团控股有限公司在香港首次公开募股中募集了 35 亿港元（4.42 亿美元）资金，在首次尝试上市多年后，该公司在香港首次上市时股价下跌。【原文：Billionaire Richard Li’s FWD Group Holdings Ltd. declined in its trading debut in Hong Kong after raising HK$3.5 billion ($442 million) in an initial public offering, a bid to capitalize on the city’s listing resurgence years after its initial try.】

item.title: 美国贸易不确定性削弱风险偏好，金属走低
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推动与多国达成全面的新贸易协议进入关键阶段，铜连续第三天下跌，其他基本金属也出现下跌。【原文：Copper fell for a third day and other base metals declined as US President Donald Trump’s push for sweeping new trade deals with multiple countries reaches a critical stage.】

item.title: 继汽油之后，中国炼油企业又面临航空燃料过剩问题
item.description: 中国的炼油企业正在努力解决航空燃油供过于求的问题，这对已经在应对汽油和柴油需求减退的炼油行业的底线又是一次打击。【原文：China’s oil refiners are grappling with an oversupply of jet fuel, in yet another blow to the bottom line of a sector already dealing with ebbing demand for gasoline and diesel.】

item.title: 交易商寻求美国贸易协议谈判的明确性，黄金缓步走低
item.description: 由于投资者在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普设定的 7 月 9 日关税截止日期前等待美国贸易谈判的进展，黄金在上周上涨近 2% 后有所回落。【原文：Gold eased after gaining nearly 2% last week, as investors awaited developments in US trade negotiations ahead of a July 9 tariff deadline set by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 通胀加剧，日本实际工资创 2023 年以来最大降幅
item.description: 由于通货膨胀继续超过工资增长，日本工人的实际工资出现了自 2023 年 9 月以来的最大降幅，这给首相石破茂在约两周后举行的关键选举前带来了越来越大的问题。【原文：Japanese workers’ real wages dropped by the most since September 2023 as inflation continued to outpace salary growth, posing a growing problem for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba ahead of a key election taking place in about two weeks.】

item.title: 在福利问题上失利后，斯塔默寻求在支出问题上保持中立
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔尔默（Keir Starmer）在未能通过另一项有争议的福利削减法案后，力图控制支出，英国政府因此放弃了取消父母津贴中两个孩子上限的希望。【原文：The UK government talked down hopes that the two-child cap on parental benefits might be scrapped, as Prime Minister Keir Starmer seeks to hold the line on spending after failing to push through separate controversial welfare cuts.】

item.title: 台湾股票 ETF 流入 190 亿美元，居亚洲之首
item.description: 由于散户投资者的需求和强劲的当地货币推动了资金流动，交易员们纷纷涌向在台湾上市的股票型交易所交易基金。【原文：Traders are swarming to equity-focused, exchange-traded funds listed in Taiwan, with demand from retail investors and a strong local currency driving up flows.】

item.title: 亚洲对关税协议持谨慎态度，石油下跌：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘谨慎，因为投资者在7月9日的最后期限前等待美国进口关税的进一步细节。石油在欧佩克提高产量后下跌。【原文：Asian equities were set for a cautious start as investors awaited further details on US import duties ahead of a July 9 deadline. Oil fell after OPEC lifted output.】

item.title: 欧佩克+供应大幅增加引发供应过剩担忧，石油下跌
item.description: 在欧佩克+同意下月增产幅度超过预期之后，石油价格下跌，引发了市场对供应过剩的担忧，而美国加征关税则加剧了市场对需求前景的担忧。【原文：Oil declined after OPEC+ agreed to a bigger-than-expected production increase next month, raising concerns about oversupply just as US tariffs fan fears about the demand outlook.】

item.title: 小米创始人对电动汽车的大胆押注正在苹果失败的地方得到回报
item.description: 小米公司是唯一一家成功涉足汽车制造领域的科技公司，其创始人兼董事长雷军对此无法抗拒。【原文：Lei Jun, founder and chairman of Xiaomi Corp., the only tech company to have successfully diversified into carmaking, couldn’t resist.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称特朗普关税将于 8 月 1 日生效
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的逐国关税将于8月1日生效，这意味着在总统之前设定的7月9日最后期限之前，美国贸易伙伴将有一些喘息空间。【原文：President Donald Trump’s country-by-country tariffs will take effect Aug. 1, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said, signaling some breathing room for US trading partners ahead of a July 9 deadline previously set by the president.】

item.title: 美国和巴西试图在特朗普最后期限前达成关税协议：Uol
item.description: 据当地媒体 Uol 报道，巴西和美国的代表于周五举行了视频会议，讨论在唐纳德-特朗普总统于周三规定的最后期限之前达成一项新的关税协议。【原文：Representatives from Brazil and the US held a video conference on Friday to discuss a new tariff deal before President Donald Trump’s deadline on Wednesday, local media outlet Uol reported.】

item.title: 金砖国家数十年来推动本币化仍是痴人说梦
item.description: 金砖国家再次未能在他们讨论了十年的贸易和投资跨境支付系统方面取得重大进展。【原文：BRICS countries once again failed to make significant strides in the cross-border payments system for trade and investment they’ve been discussing for a decade.】

item.title: 简街的 "提款机 "在印度戛然而止
item.description:
此次处罚引起了其他高频交易公司的注意。【原文：

The punishment puts other high-frequency trading firms on notice.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行准备背靠背降息，关税令前景暗淡
item.description: 随着通胀压力降温和美国贸易政策对脆弱的全球前景构成威胁，澳大利亚央行将实施六年来的首次连续降息，加大宽松周期的力度。【原文：Australia’s central bank is set to deliver its first back-to-back interest-rates cuts in six years, stepping up its easing cycle as inflation pressures cool and US trade policies threaten a fragile global outlook.】

item.title: 卡尼称加拿大 "极有可能 "提出新的石油管道建议
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，通往加拿大西海岸的新石油管道 "极有可能 "被作为国家建设项目提出，这可能意味着它将成为渥太华根据新立法快速推进重大发展项目的一部分。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney said a new oil pipeline to Canada’s West Coast is “highly likely” to be proposed as a nation-building project, which could mean it becomes part of Ottawa’s push to fast-track major developments under new legislation.】

item.title: 欧佩克新供应冲击锁定石油市场恢复过剩
item.description: 欧佩克+释放的最新石油供应冲击波将在今年晚些时候加剧过剩，对全球生产商的价格造成压力，同时回应美国总统唐纳德-特朗普要求降低燃料成本的呼吁。【原文：The latest oil supply shockwave unleashed by OPEC+ is set to swell a surplus later this year, pressuring prices for producers the world over while answering US President Donald Trump’s calls for lower fuel costs.】

item.title: 泰国将向美国提供更多贸易优惠以避免 36% 的关税
item.description: 为了避免特朗普政府威胁征收 36% 的惩罚性出口税，泰国正在做出最后的努力，为美国农产品和工业产品提供更多的市场准入机会，同时增加能源和波音飞机的采购量。【原文：Thailand is making a last-ditch effort to avert a punitive 36% export levy threatened by the Trump administration with offers of greater market access for US farm and industrial goods, along with increased purchases of energy and Boeing jets.】

item.title: 市场平静进入关税日，期权交易员似曾相识
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布的 7 月 9 日关税最后期限到来之前的几天里，股票投资者们对解放日的情景记忆犹新，并没有表现出太大的担忧。【原文：In the days leading up to President Donald Trump’s July 9 tariffs deadline, equity investors having flashbacks of Liberation Day showed little concern.】

item.title: 沙特在欧佩克+加息一天后上调亚洲主油价
item.description: 由于石油和燃料需求保持稳定，沙特阿拉伯提高了下个月面向亚洲买家的主要原油等级的价格。此举是在欧佩克+产油国同意第四轮大幅增产后一天做出的，表明沙特对市场充满信心。【原文：Saudi Arabia raised prices for its main crude grade for buyers in Asia next month as demand for oil and fuels holds up. The move, a day after OPEC+ producers agreed to a fourth round of big output hikes, suggests the kingdom is confident about the market.】

item.title: 美元怀疑论者为发展中国家债务带来历史性收益
item.description: 美国政策的波动让资金经理们在全球范围内寻找替代方案，推动新兴市场国家的地方债券在上半年取得了 16 年来的最佳表现。【原文：US policy volatility has sent money managers scouring the world for alternatives, propelling local bonds from emerging-market countries to their best first half in 16 years.】

item.title: 印度太阳能光伏组件制造商 Emmvee 申请 IPO
item.description: Emmvee Photovoltaic Power 公司已向印度市场监管机构提交了招股说明书草案，寻求通过首次公开发行募集资金。【原文：Emmvee Photovoltaic Power has submitted a draft prospectus with India’s markets regulator seeking to raise funds via an initial public offering.】

item.title: 法国公司寻求在马来西亚投资 9.47 亿美元
item.description: 据马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部称，由总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）率领的贸易代表团周五在法国与 40 位行业代表会面后，多家法国公司寻求在马来西亚投资共计 40 亿林吉特（约合 9.47 亿美元）。【原文：Several French companies seek to invest a total of 4 billion ringgit ($947 million) in Malaysia after a trade delegation led by Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim met with 40 industry representatives in France on Friday, according to Malaysia’s Ministry of Investment, Trade and Industry.】

item.title: 丹娜斯逼近，台湾发布海陆台风警报
item.description: 台风 "达纳斯 "预计将带来强风和暴雨，台湾当局向全岛发布了陆地和海上警报。【原文：Taiwanese authorities issued a land and sea warning for the entire island as Typhoon Danas is expected to bring strong winds and rain.】

item.title: 关税逼近，韩国寻求延长美国贸易期限
item.description: 韩国和美国贸易官员讨论了延长 7 月 9 日贸易协议最后期限的问题，以便在最后一刻避免唐纳德-特朗普总统征收全面关税。【原文：South Korean and US trade officials have discussed extending the July 9 deadline for trade deals in a last-minute bid to avert sweeping tariffs from President Donald Trump.】
